sentences.en: Contracts that are concluded by means of fraud or duress shall be void.
sentences.cn: 采取欺诈或者胁迫手段订立的合同无效.

sentences.en: Duress alarm shall be provided for users who might be the target of coercion.
sentences.cn: 为可能成为监禁目标的用户提供警告信号.

sentences.en: Duress provide no defence to a charge of murder.
sentences.cn: 胁迫不能为谋杀提供抗辩.

sentences.en: Duress provides no defense to a charge of murder.
sentences.cn: 受到胁迫不能成为谋杀指控之抗辩.

sentences.en: He claimed that he signed the confession under duress.
sentences.cn: 他说他是被迫在认罪书上签字的.

sentences.en: He signed the confession under duress .
sentences.cn: 他出于被迫在供状上签了字。

sentences.en: He thought her confession had been made under duress.
sentences.cn: 他认为她是被刑讯逼供的。

sentences.en: I'm a Shetlander , and I wouldn't live anywhere else except under duress.
sentences.cn: “我是一名设得兰人, 除非是被胁迫,否则我不会住在其他任何地方. ”

sentences.en: It was a rough and blowy night when Cowperwood started for this institution under duress.
sentences.cn: 当柯帕乌被逼动身到这个机关里去的时候,是寒风刺骨的夜里.

sentences.en: Often, however, demands of career and parenthood conflict, generating duress and stress.
sentences.cn: 不过, 事业的需要常常与做父母的身份发生冲突而产生某种强迫与压力.

sentences.en: The chief criminals shall be punished without fail, those who are accomplices under duress shall go unpunished and those who perform deeds of merit shall be rewarded.
sentences.cn: 首恶必办， 胁从不问，立功受奖。

sentences.en: The chief criminals shall be punished without fail, those who are accomplices under duress shall go unpunished and those who perform deeds of merIt'shall be rewarded.
sentences.cn: 首恶必办, 胁从不问,立功受奖.

sentences.en: The mistakes within the contract afforded him great duress.
sentences.cn: 合同中的差错给他造成极大的束缚.

sentences.en: These unequal treaties were made under duress.
sentences.cn: 这些不平等条约是在强迫下签订的.

sentences.en: Those who acted under duress shall go unpunished.
